Class OrderMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBAccess.OrderMapper

extends java.lang.Object
    Used to get information from the database associated with an order

    • Method Detail

      • createOrder

        public static void createOrder(Order order)
                        throws DatabaseException

        Creates a new order

        Create orders takes an order object and check whether there is a shed in that order

        by looking at shedDepth which would null if there is not.

        Then it execute two different sets of SQL statements depending on the information.

        Parameters:
        order - The order object with the information to be created in the db
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - An exception for database erros

      • updateOrder

        public static void updateOrder(int orderID,
                               Order order)
                        throws DatabaseException

        Updates an existing order

        Parameters:
        orderID - The Order ID to be updated
        order - The Order object with the updated information
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - An exception for database erros

      • getOrder

        public static Order getOrder(int ID)
                      throws DatabaseException

        Gets a single order from database based on the ID

        Parameters:
        ID - The Order ID to be updated
        Returns:
        Order The Order object pulled from the database,
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - An exception for database erros

      • getAllOrders

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Order> getAllOrders()
                                               throws DatabaseException

        Gets all orders from the database

        Also checks if each order has a shed connected with it

        Returns:
        Arraylist of orders with all orders in the database
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - An exception for database erros
